name: Dr. Michael Chen
title: Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist
about: Dr. Michael Chen is a licensed marriage and family therapist with over 8 years of experience helping couples and families navigate relationship challenges. He specializes in improving communication, resolving conflicts, and strengthening emotional bonds. Dr. Chen takes a culturally-sensitive approach, particularly effective for Asian and multicultural families.

education.degree: Master of Science in Marriage and Family Therapy
